description.narrative: Output 1: By 2017, Child Welfare and Protection Laws and Policies are consistent with or better than international standards and resources for implementation are increasingly available., which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Harmful Practices (Fgm/C And Child Marriage), Justice For Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome (1): Children, especially girls, are better served by an effective Child and Family Welfare System that protects them from violence, abuse, exploitation, discrimination and neglect.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1: By 2017, Child Welfare and Protection Laws and Policies are consistent with or better than international standards; andresources for implementation are increasingly available.

description.narrative: Draft regulations related to adoption and foster care ready to be tabled before parliament; areas of further amendments identified. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:21/12/2017

title.narrative: Number of girls, boys, women and men benefitting from awareness activities to promote access to services to respond to incidents of GBV (e.g. how, where and why to access services for GBV)

actual.value: 2017:National Strategic Framework on Ending Child Marriage (2017-2026) were finalized. The framework has a monitoring plan and provides costing for the broad results areas.

title.narrative: Degree of alignment between child welfare and protection laws and policies and child-centered values, local cultural and social context and international standards.

actual.value: 2017:Comprehensive legislative reform is still ongoing with all regional and national consultations completed. Three areas have been identified as key during the process, corporal punishment, child online protection, age of consent. This will be taken up further in 2018.
